main.title: general settings
main.message: Here you'll find the general settings like notifications and language.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.message: We need to get your permissions to send desktop notifications. You won't be asked again when accepted.

noAPI.title: Browser not supported!
noAPI.message: I'm sorry, but the browser you are using does not support desktop notifications, please consider a update to a modern browser like Firefox and Chrome.

2fa.title: Two Factor Authentication
2fa.message: Two Factor Authentication (or 2FA) adds a extra layer of securety to your account. You will have to fill in a time-based code on top of the normal username/password authentication. This code is generated by your cellphone with apps like Authy. This is optional, but recommented. Scan the barcode with your authenticator. Fill in a code gain from te app to enable 2FA.

mailbox.title: mailbox settings
mailbox.explanation: Here you can add new mailboxes, manage existing ones and pair mailboxes to SMTP clients.

sessions.title: session settings
sessions.explanation: Here you can view the current active sessions.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.send_desc: Send a desktop notification when a new Email is received.
